item.text: (ka) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 大般若經第一部
This is a blank page without image
$/ /rgya gar skad du/
@##/ /sha ta sa ha sri ka prad nya pa ra mi ta/ bod
skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
brgya pa/ glegs bam thog ma/ bam po
dang po/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri/ bya
rgod 'phungs po la/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med
pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/
rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la/ pha rol tu phyin
pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/ dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i
bdag mo chen mo las stsogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / shin tu mang pa kun kyang / chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po/ tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog
pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag
par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo med cing brtson
'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa grags pa dang / khe dang bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab
mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa
rgyun chad pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
rtogs par bka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ thog
mar smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas
pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang /
rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can
thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs chen
po dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag bka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams
cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/ las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul zad

mi shes pa la bzhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/

bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par myos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshul med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par

bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'jig rten rtag tu rgyun mi chad

par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/ sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi

bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs
gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin

chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyob sbed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po bzang po'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gros 'phel ba

dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib med blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po

dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dpe med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po de dag dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/ sku drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag

nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin kyi rgyal po

zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/ /de ltar gzigs

nas sku thams cad nas 'od gzer rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od

gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs kyi long bu gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs byin pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug

cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs pus mo gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /sku lta zur gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /sku rtsib logs gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /thugs

ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /phyag gis sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /phyag lag ngar gnyis las kyang 'od gzer

bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /mgur nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /tshems mche ba

bzhi las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /tshems bzhi bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /spyan gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /

snyan gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /shangs kyi sbubs gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo / /steng gi spyi gtsug nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo / /zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ste/ 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug

cu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba

chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos

khyab par byas so/ /byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i glung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab

par byas so/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos

khyab par byas so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i glung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab

par byas so/ /steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dkye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di

snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab

par byas so/ /nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /byang shar

kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho

nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas

so/ /'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can

gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od

kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams

gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen

pos khyab par mdzad do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab

par mdzad do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /

'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /

sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas

ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od gzer kha dog

sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mthon te/ 'od gzer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba mdab ma stong dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug

pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin ti ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /

'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu

phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /de dag lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan

pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid

kyi chos ston to/ /de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi

'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i

klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs

shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha

rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos

bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /

sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin

seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /

kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go/ /rab tu ldeg go/ /kun tu ldeg go/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig /

rab tu shig shig /kun tu shig shig /mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus bags kyi nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi

stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te/ sems can de dag

thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal pa mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha

de dag dang / mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rab rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams

cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de

nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du

dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi

sems can thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang /

nyams bde ba de nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs

pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ nub phyog kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang

ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes

so/ de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de dag nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe'i skad

cig yud tsam thang cig la/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems

can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba nyid kyis sngon gyis tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran

nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du

phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ byang shar kyi

phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa

thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes

su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang

bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe'i skad

cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten

thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ myi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa

dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed

kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ myi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad

kyang myi dang lhar skal pa snyams par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos

pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur te/ de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal

dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa

mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rab rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde

ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag

'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems

can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar bskal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran

nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de

dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad

cig yud tsam thang cig la/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad

mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis

sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud

par gyur to/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra

thos par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to/ /gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyang

nor thob par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/ /skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to/ /lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams

kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tshe ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi

las kyi mtha' dang / 'tshe ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tshe ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper

na/ pha dang ma dang phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen dang / grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam pa nyid gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs

par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtogs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /dper na dge slong bsam gtan

gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/ /dul ba ni dge ba'o/ /

sdom pa ni dge ba'o/ /dben pa ni dge ba'o/ /bag byed pa ni dge ba'o/ /byams pa ni dge ba'o/ /snying rje ni dge ba'o/ /srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma sgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/ zla ba nya'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ stong gsum

gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang gcas pa/ dbang po bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang

bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne lhang nge'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog /gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed

zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang /

sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis

mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang

nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin

du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du nub byang gyi phyogs mtsham

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed

zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma

snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis

non par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di

lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po

dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang / 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /

de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen

bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde

zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ud pa

la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / so'u gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan

dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug spos dang / ud pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang /

pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / so'u gan d+hi dang / me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gi bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /

mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po

khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la stsogs pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs

dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la stsogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs par/ stong gsum gyi

stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du red de gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lda lding mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/ /mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/ /

rab tu phyung bar gyur to/ /me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu nges

kyang / shin tu mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji ltar ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom

ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab

cing gsal bar gyur to/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan

'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /

'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung

gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par

gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku

blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sku blta bas chos mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku blta bas chos mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /mtshe mi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta
bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta
bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi

shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/

'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam

du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/

de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa

bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /chung snang gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi

mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi

mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs

shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /chung

dge'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams

kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi

shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /chung che'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong
nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa
mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams

kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams

kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha
rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /gya nom snang ba'i
lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'og

min gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /de bzhin du
stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi

mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems

par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la

bzhugs bzhin du/ 'od rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /

rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /byang

phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i

phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /

nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /steng gi

phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis
shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i

'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong

bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /nub

phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung

gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na

sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/

dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can

gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi

dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig

rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya bar bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug
'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom

ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu

'di ni/ nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /
de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bskur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang / phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig

pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas gyis bka'

stsal pa rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyud las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khyi'u

dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de

dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur

bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste pad+mo gser gyi mdog
can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du

skur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed

po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur bstir byas so/ /phu dud du byas so/ /mchod pa byas so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/

bam po gnyis pa/ de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang

dag par ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong de nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig

rten gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub

pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrubs pa rab

tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa de dag thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs

kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpa' gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gi gtor cig rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
zhing der bag yod par spyod cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can

mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas

kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / phreng ba dang /

byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyan mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i

rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/
zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /

'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par

gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur bstir byas so/ /phu dud du byas so/ /mchod pa byas so/ /de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams

gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas

snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro

gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung

ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das

pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di ce skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par

rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen

'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong skur ste/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar bka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las pad+mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang

'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /

na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / dgyes par

spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das

la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag gzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i

klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par

gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur bstir byas so/ /phu dud du byas so/ /mchod pa byas so/ /de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi

khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs

shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po

de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad
ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /'di ni de'i mthu yin te de
'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing

bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad

la dbang rab tu thob bo/ /de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed

der song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyud las
byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur ste/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor

cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/

der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las

pad+mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang /

byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu

'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/
bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/

byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor do/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams

de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang

gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs

su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /phu dud du

byas so/ /mchod pa byas so/ /de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin kyi rgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang /

sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin kyi glang po dam pa'i dpal

gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po

'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs

kyi bu 'di ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten

gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag

blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyi bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na

'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par

rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la

pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der

nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i

dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas

kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdugs spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa

dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
