ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /lus yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /yid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /
gzugs yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /sgra yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /dri yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /
ro yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /reg yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /chos yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /
myig gis rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /

sna'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba
'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi
sbyor myi 'byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /lce'i 'dus
te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba
'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba yod
ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

gyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /sa'i khams yod ces bya ba 'am/ myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /chu'i khams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor
myi 'byed do/ /me'i khams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /rlung gi khams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /nam mkha'i khams yod ces bya ba'am

myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /ma rig pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /'du byed yod ces bya

ba'am myed ces bya bar mi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /mying dang gzugs yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /skye mched

drug yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /reg pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /tshor ba yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /sred pa
yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /len pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /srid pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi
'byed do/ /skye ba yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /rga shi yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /nang

stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya

bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /don dam pa

stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am
myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma dang med pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba
'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces
bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar
myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi

'byed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod ces bya ba

'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /dbang po rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /stobs rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod ces bya ba
'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod ces
bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor
mi 'byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod ces bya ba 'am med

ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /byams pa chen po yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /snying rje chen po yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod ces
bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /rang byang chub yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am
med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe/ spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs
so/ /spyod pa yang ma yin/ myi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar myi dmyigs so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /

chen po stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi don

du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /

thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi don tu

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /skye ba myed pa stong pa nyid

kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /'gag pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /phyir myi ldog pa'i sa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la myi spyod do/ /sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la myi spyod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /dbang po rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /stobs rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la mi spyod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi don du shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la mi spyod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa

med pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la mi spyod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /mi
'jigs pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /byams pa chen po'i

don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /snying rje chen po'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi

mi spyod do/ /de bzhin nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos gang la yang tha dad pa 'am/ bye
brag gam/ khyad par du lta ba med do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /de

lha'i mig gi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la mi spyod do/ /sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /zag pa zad pa'i ye

shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par
rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te/ rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa dmigs pa lta ga las 'ongs/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/

lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /
mchod par bya'o/ /snyam du myi sems so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/
byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du
bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /
bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de
dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyis

'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o
snyam du myi sems so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas
te/ 'og gis phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir
bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /snyam du mi sems so/ /bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ steng gis phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /bkur bstir bya'o/ /phu dud du bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /
snyam du mi sems so/ /de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang ji snyed ston pa de dag thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag gis sems
can rnams kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi sngon gyi gnas bdag gi rjes su dran par bya'o/ /lha'i mig gis sems can de dag 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes par 'gyur
ba rnams bdag gis mthong bar bya'o/ /sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa dag bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du mi sems te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud glags tshol zhing / nyams skyod pa rnams kyis kyang glags mi snyed do/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
cad kyang lhun gyis grub pa dang / yongs su brtag pa med par 'thun par 'grub bo/ /'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu stsal bar 'gyur ro/ /shar
phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la
nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang /

dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang /

tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge ba dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge' rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che
ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par
gyur du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ 'di ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung bar mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang /

tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang / chung dge' dang / tshad myed dge' ba dang / dge' rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang /

myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur du 'ong ngo / /

zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/ /
rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang /

chung dge' dang / tshad myed dge' ba dang / dge' rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang /

gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu

bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems can thams cad

la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de la/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang /
tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang / chung dge' dang / tshad myed dge' ba dang /

dge' rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du

thams cad myed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan

'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun

snang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge' ba dang / dge' rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang /

shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /

de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems
can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs
pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung bar mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum
cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang /
tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge' dang / tshad myed
dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba

dang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig

yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed
pa'i phyir ro/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de las nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor

dang tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang / chung dge' dang / tshad myed dge' ba dang / dge' rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang /

tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/

la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur
ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la/ byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos

kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'

dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang /

kun snang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang / chung dge' dang / tshad med dge' ba dang / dge' rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang /
shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba

byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar mdzad do/ /
rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams

dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang / chung dge' dang /

tshad myed dge' ba dang / dge' rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang /
'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu
bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems can
thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag
thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo / /zhes yongs su bsrung bar mdzad do/ /
rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams

dang tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge' ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad myed dge ba dang /

dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad myed che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ la la zhig bar chad byed par gyur tu 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du

thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo dag kyang tshegs myi che bar mngon tu 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du chos gang la la chos rnams dang 'du ba 'am/ 'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'phrad pa 'am/ myi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya bar myi
sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang 'du ba 'am/ 'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'phrad pa 'am myi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /sha ra dwa
ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du bdag gis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam myi 'gyur zhes bya bar myi sems te/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang / tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba myi 'byed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram/

'on tam khong du chud par myi 'gyur zhes bya bar myi sems te/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba myed do/ /de yang

'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar myi sbyor/ /myi stong zhe bya bar myi sbyor ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/

stong pa nyid dang gzugs su myi sbyor ro/ /tshor ba dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang tshor bar myi sbyor ro/ /'du shes dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du shes su myi sbyor ro/ /

'du byed dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du byed du myi sbyor ro/ /rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par myi sbyor ro/ /myig dang stong pa nyid du

myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang myig du myi sbyor ro/ /rna ba dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna bar myi sbyor ro/ /sna dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang snar myi sbyor ro/ /

lce dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lcer mi sbyor ro/ /lus dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus su myi sbyor ro/ /yid dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid

du myi sbyor ro/ /gzugs dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su myi sbyor ro/ /sgra dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgrar mi sbyor ro/ /dri dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/

stong pa nyid dang drir myi sbyor ro/ /ro dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ror myi sbyor ro/ /reg dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg tu myi sbyor ro/ /chos dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/

stong pa nyid dang chos su myi sbyor ro/ /myig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang myig gi khams su myi sbyor ro/ /gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang

gzugs kyi khams su myi sbyor ro/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /rna ba'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/

stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /sgra'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong

pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang / sna'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/

stong pa nyid dang / dri'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /lce'i khams dang
stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /ro'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ro'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i

khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /lus kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi khams su myi sbyor

ro/ /reg bya dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg byar myi sbyor ro/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su

myi sbyor ro/ /yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su myi sbyor ro/ /chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su myi sbyor ro/ /

yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni rnal

'byor dam pa ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyis zhing yang yongs su

dag par byed do/ /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnal 'byor du bya ba gang
ci yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ rab ces bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rnal 'byor te/ bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor to/ /
sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o/ /
sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i don byed kyang / de 'di snyam du bdag ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa yin no zhe 'am/ brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems so/ /bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung bston pa mdzad do/ /
bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/ /bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/ /bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu 'byed pa myed
de/ de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba 'am/ gang bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba/ de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi 'du shes myi skye'o/ /bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /srog gi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /'gro ba'i 'du shes
mi skye'o/ /gso' ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /skyes bu'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /gang zag gi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /shed can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /shed bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /byed pa po'i 'du

shes mi skye'o/ /tshor ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /shes pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa

myed pa'i phyir te/ sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do/ /gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa myed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa yin/ sems can myi dmyigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can rang bzhin
myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor
te/ des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par bsgrub bo/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni/ ser sna'i sems mi skye'o/ /tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang
gnod par sems pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi skyed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas 'chi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas 'chi

'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas 'chi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang myi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas 'chi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor du myur du 'grub pa ste/ tshe rabs 'di 'das
nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhag go/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang de dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ de dag la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po gang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'chi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/ de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge

'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang myi'i nang nas 'chi 'phos nas/ myi dang skal pa mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/ phyir myi ldog
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no/ /de la gzungs kyi sgo

dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon tu mi 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang khyod kyis de skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal
'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ zhes smras pa ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po/ thabs la mi mkhas pa dag /bsam gtan dang po la yang mnyam par gzhog /bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang mnyam par gzhog /

bsam gtan gsum pa la yang mnyam par gzhog /bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang mnyam par gzhog cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang spyod do/ /de dag bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing /
gal te myi'i nang du skye ba thob nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la/ bsnyen bkur byed na yang / de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po myi rno ba yang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyod de/ de dag thabs la myi mkhas pas/
bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/ dbang po
rno ba ma yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang
snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje la yang snyoms
par 'jug /dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas
skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug /dbang po lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug /stobs lnga
la yang snyoms par 'jug /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang snyoms par 'jug /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje chen po la yang snyoms par
'jug ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi dbang gis myi skye/ tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa'i dbang gis myi skye ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do/ /de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms
par 'jug /bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug /dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms
la yang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /
'du shes med 'du shes med myin gyi skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gi myi skye'o/ /

de dag ni phyir 'dod khams 'dir skyes kyang / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/ de yang srid pa
la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyis/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms
par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje la yang snyoms par
'jug /dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /'du shes myed 'du shes med myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas/
bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis myi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o/ /
sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o/ /'phrul dga'i lha
rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye ste/ de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yong su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
yongs su dag par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la sbyod pa dag /thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /
bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug /dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la
yang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms
par 'jug /'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de/ de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ /de dag de na yang tshangs pa tshangs
chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na yang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te/ de dag de na 'khod cing gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing 'dong ngo / /de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don tu gsol ba gdab pa byed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis

thogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa dag /thabs mkhas pas/ bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /bsam

gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug /snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug /dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug /btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched

la yang snyoms par 'jug /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug /dran

pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang yongs su sgom/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang yongs su sgom/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yang yongs su sgom/ dbang po lnga yang yongs su sgom/ stobs lnga yang yongs su sgom/ byang chub kyi

yan lag bdun yang yongs su sgom/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang yongs su sgom/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gi dbang gis

mi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon tu gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur cing / de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o/ /de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas

nas/ dbang po ma nyams pa dang / dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te/ mdun du byas na 'dir skye ba bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs

rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye bar/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phud dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di

ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi theg

pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa

drug thob pa dag /mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i

bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag /'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta

bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing / sangs rgyas kyi legs pa rjod/ chos kyi legs pa rjod/ dge 'dun gyi legs pa rjod pas/ sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos

kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te/ gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin cad bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong

ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs

pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas/ de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs

kyi khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye zhing / de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa

drug la spyod pa dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas

phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod

do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong du ma dag dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don tu 'dod pa

dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag

bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/ tshul du mas rnam par rtse zhing / 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ /de dag bsam gtan dang po de las
langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par gzhog go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs
nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las
langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas
'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas
'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ /cung zad med pa'i
skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par gzhog go/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug

go/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do/ /sha

ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thob pa/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa/ dbang po lnga thob pa/ stobs lnga thob pa/ byang
chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa rnams thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa/ rnam par thar

pa brgyad thob pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa/ gzungs

kyi sgo rnams thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po

thob kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed/ rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzungs pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed de/ sems can de dag des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa

dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol

tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su spyod pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po bar shes par bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
bdun thob pa/ mngon par shes pa drug thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco

brgyad thob pa dag /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don tu spyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis

thogs par shes par bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag /'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing de dag gi sems can

rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa grangs med tshad med pas/ bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don tu rtag par

brtson te/ nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra/ gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha

rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can gyi don tu rtag tu brtson pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing /

zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la gzhon pa dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng

ba dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang / 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa

rnams la khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu

phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang / gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa

dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse

gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams

dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos ston pa dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa

drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma

yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye

par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub

sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i

klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par

phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de

dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams

la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /

de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan
ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe

gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su

bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang

yod do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan

cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad

par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /nub

byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang

chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba

khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /'og gi

phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub
sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya

che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa
dag kyang yod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur
byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan

ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe

gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa

gnyis dang ldan par byas te/ dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po'i dga' ba dang / mos pa skyed de/ de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying

du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthar kyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /ngag yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /yid yongs su dag pa la

bslab par bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag

mi stod cing gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin cad/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la gnas shing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing log par 'gro ba dang ngan song du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin cad/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems

can rab tu 'god pa dang / sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing / de dag la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas

bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang / mchod pa sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed pa
dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi

chos kyis snang bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dag nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa

dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rnams gyi go mi dbye'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang dang bcas pa gang lags/ ngag gi las kha na
ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam

du sems shing / 'di ni lus yin gyi des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni ngag yin gyis des ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni yid yin gyis des ni yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na/ de ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/ lus
gang dang / ngag gang dang / yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi sems bskyed pa 'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ 'khrug pa'i
sems bskyed pa 'am/ shes rab 'chal ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so/ /ngag mi dmigs so/ /sems mi dmigs so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / ngag gi gi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du ni shes par mi bya ste/ de ni gnas med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo / /ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo / /yid

kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/ /yid kyi las kha na ma
tho ba med pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong

ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs/ ngag mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigs na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems skyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad

par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs

su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang / ngag la dmigs pa med pa dang / yid la dmigs pa med pa

dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
