rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa
med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par

gyur pa de ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la dmigs pa med cing blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nan tan byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa'i rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
la rlom sems med pa dang / tshor ba la rlom sems med pa dang / 'du shes la rlom sems med pa dang / 'du byed la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mig dang gzugs
la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba dang sgra la rlom sems med pa dang / sna dang dri la rlom sems med pa dang / lce dang ro la rlom sems med pa dang / lus dang reg la rlom sems med pa dang / yid dang
chos la rlom sems med pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chu'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / me'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / nam
mkha'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzugs kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi rnam par

shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sgra'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sna'i khams la
rlom sems med pa dang / dri'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / ro'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /
lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lus kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / reg bya'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems

med pa dang / yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chos kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rlom sems med

pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / phyi

stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la rlom

sems med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid

la rlom sems med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

la rlom sems med pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / dbang po lnga la rlom

sems med pa dang / stobs lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom

sems med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la rlom

sems med pa dang / mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rlom sems
med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom
sems med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / byams pa chen po la rlom sems med pa dang / snying rje chen po la rlom
sems med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems
med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems
med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / 'khor ba la rlom sems med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa med do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/ mi dbul zhing phongs pa rnams su

myong bar mi 'gyur te/ lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing

phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang

lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang

mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /

chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems

dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge

'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung

gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan

rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam

par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong

ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / /chos kyang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /ye shes de

lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /chos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /
rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /bdag gis 'du shes mi skyed do/ /gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /sangs

rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ /brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs so/ /

nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus byas stong

pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /thog ma dang
tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ thog ma dang tha ma stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin
stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
mi dmigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dngos

po med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

pa bzhi sgom ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /dbang po lnga sgom ste/ dbang po rnams mi dmigs so/ /stobs lnga sgom ste/ stobs rnams mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom ste/ byang
chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ /bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sgom ste/
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /mtshan ma med pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma med pa mi dmigs so/ /smon pa med pa sgom ste/ smon pa med pa mi dmigs so/ /
mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs
so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi

sgom ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /byams pa chen po sgom ste/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po sgom ste/ snying rje chen po mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

bco brgyad sgom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid sgom ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rang byang chub

sgom ste/ rang byang chub rnams mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
mi dmigs so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad

kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig
dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra
dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya
mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad lnga brgya mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig

gis dpag tshad drug brgya mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bdun brgya mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgyad brgya mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad dgu brgya mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis gling gsum mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa
ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis

stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha

rnams kyis lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig
gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa

de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni

byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin

pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems

dpas rab tu shes so/ /chung snang gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes

so/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /chung dge'i lha

rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig

gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /chung che'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
dpas rab tu shes so/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems

dpas rab tu shes so/ /mi chen ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes

so/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'og min gyi
lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mtshe
ma'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni
'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung snang gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi

shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung dge'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung che'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lho phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nub phyogs kyi
'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang
phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
ni/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig

de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes
so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi
'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi
mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/ 'dus
ma byas sam/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa
'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ chos gang yang ma mthong ba
med ma thos pa med/ ma bsams pa med/ khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo

stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol
ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom dang tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes
bya'o/ /des sgom pa'i lam rab tu shes so/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms
nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /
gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/ /gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i

dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba
gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des bsgoms pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag
'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /de
lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom

pa'o/ /gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag

pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i

kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des bsgoms pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang

zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ /de lam de nyid
de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya

bar rab tu shes te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ji yang

rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no zhes bya bar shes pas/ dad pa la stsogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po

bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te/ thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te
lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /

khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /
'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/ /de de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed par
'gyur ro/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

tu lung bstan pa'o/ /'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'di ni nges pa'o/ /'di ni ma nges pa'o/ /'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o/ /'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/ dbang po thob pa'o/ /

'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste/ dbang po ma thob pa'o/ /'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par

shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang /

bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /

rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams

mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung

gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod
pa byed do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes

par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ /'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni mngon

par shes pa thob par myi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o/ /'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no/ /'di ni dbang po thob pa'o/ /'di ni dbang po thob ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi

zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang

ldan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang myi ldan pa'o/ /'dis ni sems can yongs su smyin par byas so/ /'dis ni sems can yongs su smyin par ma byas so/ /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs pa brjod pa mdzad do/ /'di la ni legs pa brjod pa
myi mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni nye bar gnas par myi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas/ tshe dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge

'dun ni tshad myed par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ byang

chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni spyod par myi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o/ /'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no/ /'di ni snying
po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni 'dug par myi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par myi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar

rab tu shes te/ de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas

kyi myig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
par bzhag nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin/ btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa yin/
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa myed pa dang ldan pa yin/ de ni de'i myig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig de dang ldan pas/ rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/

ma thos pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang yang myed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas

kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smras pas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus shes brjod pa zhig tu dgos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig lnga skyed pa'o/ /myig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam

pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/ /de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/ /gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/ /mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /snang ba dang myi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do/ /

rtsig pa las thal ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa myed pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags

bya bzhin no/ /sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul ba byed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la yang 'bying ba myed par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/ /du bar 'thul zhing myer 'bar te/

dper na mye'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur

te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems

su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu myi dmigs te/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnams pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par

dag pa'i myi las 'das pas lha dang myi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/ lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do/ /de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang

rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rna ba dang sgrar dmyigs pa myed do/ /de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa yang myi skyed do/ /de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /des sems can pha rol dang /

gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /

'dod dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta

ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems

shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa

dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nye bar len pa dang

bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nye bar len pa myed pa'i sems la nye bar len pa myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
du rab tu shes so/ /kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems shes bya bar

yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rgya chung ba'i sems la rgya chung ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes

so/ /yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /

tshad myed pa'i sems la tshad myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes

so/ /mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa

ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya

bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zag pa myed pa'i sems la zag pa myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs

pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /

bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /bla na myed pa'i sems la bla na myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ /
gzhan gyi sems shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /'di ltar rang bzhin

stong pa dang rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes par bya

ba'i bsam pa 'am/ sems shes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can

thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par sgrub

ste/ sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ sems brgya'i bar du rjes su dran no/ /nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya'i bar du rjes su dran no/ /zla ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas zla ba brgya'i bar

du yang rjes su dran no/ /lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas lo brgya'i bar du rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa brgya phrag du ma yang rjes

su dran no/ /bskal pa stong phrag du ma yang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran te/ bdag de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/
ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni 'di srid cig du 'dug 'dug /tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig du gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas

shi 'phos nas ni che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas gtan tshigs dang bcas don rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi

gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/ bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/ /'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i
phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /

de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang bde 'gro na

gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa ldan/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa log par
lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/ ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par
spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba myi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus

zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs

pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do/ /de ni 'di ltar myig de myig ma yin zhing bsam gyis myi khyab

pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i myig
de lta bu des myi dmyigs te/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i myig gi bsam pa 'am/ lha'i myig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu

de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / lha'i myig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du

bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par myi byed do/ /gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang

myi mthong ngo / /de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ba byed de/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon

par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do/ /de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /de yang 'di ltar rang

bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu myi dmyigs so/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/ zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa 'am zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing / mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar

yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa myed pa'i sems

nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba bya ba myed pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /
sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong

pa nyid kyi phyir myi khrug pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus myi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod

do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir

'khrug pa myed pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems myi dmyigs pa nye bar gzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam

sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

kyi phyir 'ong ba myed pa dang 'gro ba myed pa nye bar bzung ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam/ yongs su sbyong ba yin no/ /de la sbyin pa ni yongs su
'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ /tshul khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ /bzod pa ni 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ /brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung
ba las gdags so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/ /shes rab ni shes rab 'chal ba nye bar bzung ba las gdags te/ de ni rgal to zhes bya bar rlom

sems myed do/ /ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /sbyin pa myi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /tshul khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar
rlom sems myed do/ /tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /bzod pa phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /khro ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /
brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /mnyam par ma
bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /shes rab dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /shes rab 'chal ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /spyos so zhes bya bar rlom
sems myed do/ /phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems

myed do/ /rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/ 'di la sha ra dwa ti'i bu

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la myed de/ de yon tan 'di dag yongs
su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i
bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad la mnyam
pa'i sems bskyed nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob bo/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god
do/ /de ni tshe 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byon cing dben par bya ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas

thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba yin/ de ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang / de dang de dag tu nam yang myig gis yid du myi 'ong ba'i gzugs myi mthong ngo / /rna bas yid du myi 'ong ba'i

sgra myi thos so/ /snas yid du myi 'ong ba'i dri myi tshor ro/ /lces yid du myi 'ong ba'i ro myi myong ngo / /lus kyis yid du myi 'ong ba'i reg bya myi reg go/ /yid kyis yid du myi 'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa myed do/ /

sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong sum brgyas gos gyon gyon pa bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa myi mdzad na/ ji'i rgyu ji'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig 'das nas/ bskal pa dpe' skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi sgul ba'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o/ /'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug cus kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang / de dag bla na

myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe 'khor bzhi po de dag ni 'di na 'khod bzhin no/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /

lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong
mthong bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs
rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnams par phye ba de dag ni myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na yod par ma mthong
ngo / /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/ srong chags stong phrag bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las spyad par bya'o zhes smon lam btab
bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig la
bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa myi mdzad na/ ji'i rgyu ji'i rkyen kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong
ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur

ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du yang myi 'bral te/ phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau'u dgal chen po'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa bshes

pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / dge slong gzhan dag kun kyang mngon par shes pa shin tu mang ba dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang /

dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta

ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog go/ /bcom ldan 'das

'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gya nom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzang po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga na ma mchis pa'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs

pa ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad
yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad ldan pa'o/ /bcom ldan

'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thug pa ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo / /yongs su gtong ngo / /yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /

thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs so/ /srung ngo srung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du myi mnyam pa mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ de'i

slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so/ /sgom mo/ /sgom par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su

rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par 'gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di

lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so/ /rtsom mo/ /rtsom par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su
rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa mnyam pa'i bsam gtan skyed do/ /skyed do/ /skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs
so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/
bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms so/ sgom mo/ sgom par 'gyur ro/ de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /yongs su rdzogs so/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /
de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ /'thob bo/ /thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad pas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'dus shes thob par gyur to/ /

myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ myi mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob
par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam

pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/ /ma byon pa'i

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par 'gyur ro/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par
'gyur ro/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par 'gyur ro/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /

myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur ro/ /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob par 'gyur to/ /

myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/ /de lta lags pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la brtson par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba
lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du
bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ myi'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i 'jig rten

'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho

ba'i rigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum

gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar

'gyur ro/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung snang gyi lha rnams 'jig

rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten

tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /

myi che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /myi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig

rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'og myin gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
phyir myi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po yod na/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gzhon pa dang gos dang / mal cha dang / khyim dang 'tsho ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang /

gser dang / dngul dag kyang 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad myi'i rkyen dang / lha rdzas su bya ba 'am/ yang dag par bral ba'i bde ba yang rung ste/
de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad

pa spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ bdag sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro/ /bdag tshul khrims srung zhing / gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro/ /bdag
bzod pa sgom zhing gzhan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro/ /bdag brtson 'grus rtsam zhing gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro/ /bdag bsam gtan skyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro/ /bdag shes

rab sgom zhing gzhan yang shes rab bsgom pa la sbyor ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing / sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas/
'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu/
zhugs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do/ /de nas de'i tshe

ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur to/ /de byung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas

par gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos

rgyas par gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma

snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /'og gi phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
bu dag 'di ni nub phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten kyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/

des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang

ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs

rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags shes yongs su dris so/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byang phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir

'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po de dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen po bltam pa
'di su'i mthu las lags shes yongs su dris so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni shar phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed ces bya ba
